item.description:
Our very own Christina Inge is conducting a special webinar on one of the HOTTEST emerging social media channels - Pinterest!

This is not an actual meetup, but an online webinar and Christina is offering a $20 discount to BIMM members.

With Pinterest now driving more traffic to consumer websites than LinkedIn, Google+, and YouTube; many companies are rushing to establish their own presence on the channel and realize the growth in sales that market leaders have realized.

In this very practical and hands-on webinar, we'll get you up and running on Pinterest. The class will cover how to set up an effective, branded account, encourage users to share your content, and help protect your copyrights.

We'll also look at examples of successful Pinterest business pages, contests, the Gifts category, and strategies you can use to build your business on this channel.

The webinar will feature a 50-minute talk, and extensive Q&A session, so bring all your questions!

Whether you're a retailer, service provider, crafts person, arts organization, or consumer brand, the hottest new social media channel for women 25+ is the place to be for reaching your best consumers. Don't be left behind. Learn how to leverage Pinterest effectively right now.

As a BIMM member, you get $20 off the class and the book.

To register, visit http://pinterestwebcl... and enter code "pin" to receive the discount.

Hope to see you there!

Lew Sabbag & Christina Inge
item.how_to_find_us: Hit the link for the webinar signup and use the special $20 savings code
item.name: Pinterest Webinar
